sentence: The wait staff at our reception were magnificent and many of our guests commented how terrific the day was
Beautiful location fabulous facilities for all the family and helpful staff

we stayed at 3 bedroom beach house sebel twin waters the beach house firstly was very well appointed and great location for the wedding we were attending at lilys on the lagoon we stayed at the beach house with my 3 kids and mother in law the house was very clean and well set out and close to everything was quite difficult to find reception in the gated section where the beach houses were but we found it with a bit of asking around
Reception is beutiful and next to the shop there s a little cafe and offers very nice coffee
the pools were wonderful and so close to other amenities yet lovely and peaceful place to stay
Nice reception the rest is tired
I enjoyed my short stay at your facility during our conference
Lovely surroundings great facilities
The location and facilities were excellent
Lovely accommodation relaxing atmosphere and plenty to do for the kids
Looking forward to our next stay and seeing the updated main foyer and pool areas

Thankful Mr Loc came to assist key was issued almost imediatelywas not informed that the resort was under going renovation and did not know there was no elevators to the upper floor although it did not really bothered us
We stayed with other family members who were on the other side of the accommodation but we could easily meet in the middle for a drink at the pub
The refurb of the lobby and courtyard was 3rd worldish
I Expected much better facilites
If you are looking for wonderful hotel accommodation do n’t stay here
Even though our stay was short and not able to enjoy the hotel facilities we have a comfortable rest and most of all we had a close encounter with a kangaroo family
I did let the girls at reception know
I parked the car and just as my son and I reached the hotel they called and my room was ready so I had to walk back to reception get the key walk back to my car and find my room
Most people that were eating were also in the foyer

We had booked for breakfast during our stay prior to arrival but it was not included on our booking at checkin nor did it appear each day when we went to the restaurant despite us double checking at reception
The only part I could fault was check inI believe more information could of been given like a map and description of facilities
Otherwise staff and facilities great
Then found there was no lift and had to get luggage up to first floor with a toddler
Management only seem to be spending money on functions with big money spent of lobby face lift and new convention center and rooms
My husband and I have been visitng your resort for about 20 years and although the renovations to the foyer were nice some aspects of this trip were extremely disappointing
The food at the lobby bar was enjoyable although somewhat pricey

There are many lagoon facilities for those staying here provided you can access the beach which I could n’t but the Lagoon Fish and Chipery remained firmly closed and activities were limited during our stay
Hands down staff at your facility had genuine customer service and you do not find that too often
What a beautiful entrance and foyer and what a disappointing experience for the money charged
